welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lambeth, United Kingdom! Get ready to experience the vibrant mix of historic landmarks, cultural diversity, and charming neighborhoods that define our wonderful city. We invite you to immerse yourself in all that Lambeth has to offer and create unforgettable memories during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport serves all flights and offers a range of amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport, catering to VIP and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly European and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The second oldest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The second newest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly SkyTeam airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly British Airways and Oneworld airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration with personal details.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome offers a variety of services for private and commercial flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the busier of the two terminals, with a wide range of shops, restaurants, and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport offers a modern and spacious environment for travelers, with a variety of shops, restaurants, and services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with options for premium high-speed access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is currently under construction and will serve as the main terminal for Luton Airport in the future.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
